title: The Best-Dressed Stars at the Academy Museum Gala, aka “The Met Gala of the West”
summary: Selena Gomez and Benny Blanco made their first appearance as a married couple in Giorgio Armani, while Ayo Edebiri was among the stars wearing a look from Matthieu Blazy's new Chanel collection.

title: Rose Byrne, Bobby Cannavale, Patti LuPone to Star in ‘Moonstruck’ Reading (Exclusive)
summary: The cast for the one-night benefit will include Stevie Van Zandt, Steve Buscemi, John Turturro, Stephen DeRosa and Dez Duron.
